procurement_category: Goods and services for governmental use
description: THIS REQUEST IS RESERVED FOR HOLDERS OF SUPPLY ARRANGEMENT # E60PV-19EQUI ONLY, FOR THE PURCHASE OF LABORATORY AND SCIENTIFIC EQUIPMENT, PARTS AND ACCESSORIES, SERVICES AND SUPPLIES.
full_summary:
### Tender Notice : Request for Proposal (RFP) for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment

**Contract Title**: 
Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI - Laboratory Baths

**Reference Number**: cb-136-95906104

**Issued By**:
Health Canada, 200 Eglantine Driveway, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K9, Canada

**RFP Description**:

Health Canada invites qualified suppliers, currently pre-qualified under Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI, to submit a proposal for the procurement of a Dissolution Bath within the category of Laboratory and Scientific Equipment ( Laboratoire and scientific equipment, *UNSPSC code: 41100000).

**Submission Requirements**:

* The RFP is only reserved for suppliers holding a valid Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI.
* Suppliers must be pre-qualified and registered with Canada's SPWAR system.
* Suppliers are expected to respond to the requirements and specifications outlined in the RFP document.
* Tender submissions must include all necessary documentation and quotes.

**Evaluation Criteria**:
The proposal will be awarded to the supplier offering the lowest price that meets all specified requirements.

**Contract Term and Delivery**:

* Estimated Contract Start Date: 2023-10-23
* Estimated Contract End Date: 2024-03-29
* Delivery and subsequent services will be provided from Ontario (except for NCR).

**Sollicitation Details**:

* Solicitation Number: 1000252203-A
* Amendment Number: 6
* Turf Of Proposal: Electronic OPC contained on Government Electronic Directory Services (GEDS)|Electronic Document Service (EDS)
* Note solicitation data is subject to change

The tender is subject to the following trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Ontario (except NCR) has been identified as the region from which delivery of the goods and services will occur.

Please find the complete RFP documentation attached, including requirements and application information at [link to document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21530/npp-1000252203--a.pdf).

To submit your proposal, please visit the [Buying and Selling Government Goods and Services](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/refocus/) and follow the instructions outlined in the documentation.

For any general inquiries, kindly contact: Shallee Doll - (Producing the IC reference for BUYCONTEXT : external listing01): shallee.d
